attributes.action: Make it Compulsory for Children and Young People to be Educated about Health effects and Awareness of Alcohol in schools
attributes.additional_details:
Interventions in Schools to Prevent and Reduce Alcohol use Amongst Children and Young Adults and Raising awareness of the Effects Alcohol can have on Health Long term and also the Dangers of When Alcohol is just not enough and they turn to Harder Drugs . This is to Change the Future Cause I believe Educating Children from a young age is Vital in combating the Dangers of Alcohol Abuse .Our Children are taught the Green Cross
Code in Schools and Healthy Eating So Why not Alcohol Awareness?
